views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 11.

AlwaysDismissAirplaneAlert is a Tiny Tweak that Allows to Dismiss the Airplane Mode Alerts by taping the Settings Button too!

It’s useful if You want to be Warned to be Offline but you don’t have the need to enter into the Settings Application.

AlwaysDismissAirplaneAlert helps to Prevent to Accidentally Tap on the Settings Button on the Left of the Airplane Mode Alerts when it Shows Up!

The Tweak is now out from the Beta Stage of My Repository.

No options to Configure.

See Screenshot below about How It Works.

Thanks @karimouni24 for testing.

Feel free to contact me via Mail or via Twitter @CydiaGeek, enjoy it, thanks! :)

would be greatly appreciated!
